personal.name: John Doe
personal.title: Full Stack Developer
personal.tagline: I create beautiful, responsive web applications with modern technologies. Passionate about clean code and exceptional user experiences.

about.summary: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with over 5 years of experience building web applications. I love creating digital experiences that not only look great but also solve real-world problems.
about.description: When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or enjoying a good cup of coffee while planning my next project.
